title: SS Camp: Women's Hell - Sergio Garrone 1977
description:
SS Camp: Women&#039;s Hell (SS Lager 5: L&#039;inferno delle donne) - Sergio Garrone 1977
AKA - SS Camp 5: Women&#039;s Hell
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0147310/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0147310/</a>

I continue my Naziploitation series with the follow up to Sergio Garrones SS Experiment Love Camp that I uploaded yesterday.

A concentration camp physician must involuntarily help with cruel and sadistic Nazi experiments. Woman are burned alive, manhandled in the Nazi bordellos, used as guinea pigs in heartless experiments, and gunned down for trying to escape.. All thing that you want to see in a Italian Nazi-flick. :)

Ripped with DVD-Shrink (Exploitation Digital release). Movie untouched. Extras and menus compressed.

Picture: 1.85:1 Anamorphic WS

Sound: English / DD 2.0

Subtitles: NONE

Format: NTSC

Extras:

# Trailers
# Gallery
# Interview with the director

Enjoy!
